verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation_en: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
For that is the one who drives away the orphan
verses.translation_id: Itulah orang yang menghardik anak yatim,

verses.translation_en: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
verses.translation_id: dan tidak menganjurkan memberi makan orang miskin.

verses.translation_en: So woe to those who pray
verses.translation_id: Maka kecelakaanlah bagi orang-orang yang shalat,

verses.translation_en: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -
Those who make show [of their deeds]
